short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Changes Sean Spicer's name back to Sean Sphincter.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Back in Sean's Connecticut College days, a school paper somewhat accidentally published an article calling him Sean Sphincter. This made Sean angry, kind of like when people who like things like facts and reality watch his propaganda... err... press conferences.

This add-on Makes Sean Sphincter Again. It just replaces the text "Spicer" with "Sphincter" wherever it appears on a web page.
